verses.verse: הֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for [he is] good כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

יֹ֭אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> say גְּאוּלֵ֣י <S%H1350><s%> Let the redeemed יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Whom גְּ֝אָלָ֗ם <S%H1350><s%> [so] whom he hath redeemed מִיַּד־ <S%H3027><s%> from the hand צָֽר׃ <S%H6862><s%> of the enemy

וּֽמֵאֲרָצ֗וֹת <S%H776><s%> them out of the lands קִ֫בְּצָ֥ם <S%H6908><s%> And gathered מִמִּזְרָ֥ח <S%H4217><s%> from the east וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב <S%H4628><s%> and from the west מִצָּפ֥וֹן <S%H6828><s%> from the north וּמִיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> and from the south

תָּע֣וּ <S%H8582><s%> They wandered בַ֭מִּדְבָּר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness בִּישִׁימ֣וֹן <S%H3452><s%> in a solitary דָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> no city מ֝וֹשָׁ֗ב <S%H4186><s%> to dwell לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not מָצָֽאוּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> they found
רְעֵבִ֥ים <S%H7457><s%> Hungry גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again צְמֵאִ֑ים <S%H6771><s%> and thirsty נַ֝פְשָׁ֗ם <S%H5315><s%> their soul בָּהֶ֥ם תִּתְעַטָּֽף׃ <S%H5848><s%> fainted

וַיִּצְעֲק֣וּ <S%H6817><s%> Then they cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יְ֭הוָה <S%H3069><s%> God בַּצַּ֣ר <S%H6862><s%> in their trouble לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> out מִ֝מְּצֽוּקוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H4691><s%> them out of their distresses יַצִּילֵֽם׃ <S%H5337><s%> [and] he delivered

וַ֭יַּֽדְרִיכֵם <S%H1869><s%> And he led them forth בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way יְשָׁרָ֑ה <S%H3477><s%> by the right לָ֝לֶ֗כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> to a city מוֹשָֽׁב׃ <S%H4186><s%> of habitation

יוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> Oh that [men] would praise לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD חַסְדּ֑וֹ <S%H2617><s%> [for] his goodness וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <S%H6381><s%> and [for] his wonderful works לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> to the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִ֭שְׂבִּיעַ <S%H7646><s%> For he satisfieth נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> soul שֹׁקֵקָ֑ה <S%H8264><s%> the longing וְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> soul רְ֝עֵבָה <S%H7457><s%> the hungry מִלֵּא־ <S%H4390><s%> and filleth טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> with goodness

יֹ֭שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> Such as sit חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> in darkness וְצַלְמָ֑וֶת <S%H6757><s%> and in the shadow of death אֲסִירֵ֖י <S%H615><s%> [being] bound עֳנִ֣י <S%H6040><s%> in affliction וּבַרְזֶֽל׃ <S%H1270><s%> and iron

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because הִמְר֥וּ <S%H4784><s%> Because they rebelled אִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> against the words אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> of God וַעֲצַ֖ת <S%H6098><s%> the counsel עֶלְי֣וֹן <S%H5945><s%> of the most High נָאָֽצוּ׃ <S%H5006><s%> and contemned

וַיַּכְנַ֣ע <S%H3665><s%> Therefore he brought down בֶּעָמָ֣ל <S%H5999><s%> with labour לִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> their heart כָּ֝שְׁל֗וּ <S%H3782><s%> they fell down וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there עֹזֵֽר׃ <S%H5826><s%> and [there was] none to help

וַיִּזְעֲק֣וּ <S%H2199><s%> Then they cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יְ֭הוָה <S%H3069><s%> God בַּצַּ֣ר <S%H6862><s%> in their trouble לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> out מִ֝מְּצֻֽקוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H4691><s%> them out of their distresses יוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃ <S%H3467><s%> [and] he saved

יֽ֭וֹצִיאֵם <S%H3318><s%> He brought them out מֵחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> of darkness וְצַלְמָ֑וֶת <S%H6757><s%> and the shadow of death וּמוֹסְר֖וֹתֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H4147><s%> their bands יְנַתֵּֽק׃ <S%H5423><s%> in sunder

יוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> Oh that [men] would praise לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD חַסְדּ֑וֹ <S%H2617><s%> [for] his goodness וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <S%H6381><s%> and [for] his wonderful works לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> to the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שִׁ֭בַּר <S%H7665><s%> For he hath broken דַּלְת֣וֹת <S%H1817><s%> the gates נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass וּבְרִיחֵ֖י <S%H1280><s%> the bars בַרְזֶ֣ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron גִּדֵּֽעַ׃ <S%H1438><s%> in sunder

אֱ֭וִלִים <S%H191><s%> Fools מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> because פִּשְׁעָ֑ם <S%H6588><s%> of their transgression וּֽ֝מֵעֲוֹֽנֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5771><s%> and because of their iniquities יִתְעַנּֽוּ׃ <S%H6031><s%> are afflicted

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹ֭כֶל <S%H400><s%> all manner of meat תְּתַעֵ֣ב <S%H8581><s%> abhorreth נַפְשָׁ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> Their soul וַ֝יַּגִּ֗יעוּ <S%H5060><s%> and they draw near עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against שַׁ֥עֲרֵי <S%H8179><s%> unto the gates מָֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> of death

וַיִּזְעֲק֣וּ <S%H2199><s%> Then they cry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יְ֭הוָה <S%H3069><s%> God בַּצַּ֣ר <S%H6862><s%> in their trouble לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> out מִ֝מְּצֻֽקוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H4691><s%> them out of their distresses יוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃ <S%H3467><s%> [and] he saveth

יִשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> He sent דְּ֭בָרוֹ <S%H1697><s%> his word וְיִרְפָּאֵ֑ם <S%H7495><s%> and healed וִֽ֝ימַלֵּ֗ט <S%H4422><s%> them and delivered מִשְּׁחִיתוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H7825><s%> [them] from their destructions ׆

יוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> Oh that [men] would praise לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD חַסְדּ֑וֹ <S%H2617><s%> [for] his goodness וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <S%H6381><s%> and [for] his wonderful works לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> to the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men ׆

וְ֭יִזְבְּחוּ <S%H2076><s%> And let them sacrifice זִבְחֵ֣י <S%H2077><s%> the sacrifices תוֹדָ֑ה <S%H8426><s%> of thanksgiving וִֽיסַפְּר֖וּ <S%H5608><s%> and declare מַעֲשָׂ֣יו <S%H4639><s%> his works בְּרִנָּֽה׃ <S%H7440><s%> with rejoicing ׆

יוֹרְדֵ֣י <S%H3381><s%> They that go down הַ֭יָּם <S%H3220><s%> to the sea בָּאֳנִיּ֑וֹת <S%H591><s%> in ships עֹשֵׂ֥י <S%H6213><s%> that do מְ֝לָאכָ֗ה <S%H4399><s%> business בְּמַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> in great ׆

הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They רָ֭אוּ <S%H7200><s%> These see מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <S%H4639><s%> the works יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <S%H6381><s%> and his wonders בִּמְצוּלָֽה׃ <S%H4688><s%> in the deep ׆

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> For he commandeth וַֽ֭יַּעֲמֵד <S%H5975><s%> and raiseth ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind סְעָרָ֑ה <S%H5591><s%> the stormy וַתְּרוֹמֵ֥ם <S%H7311><s%> which lifteth up גַּלָּֽיו׃ <S%H1530><s%> the waves ׆

יַעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> They mount up שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> to the heaven יֵרְד֣וּ <S%H3381><s%> they go down תְהוֹמ֑וֹת <S%H8415><s%> again to the depths נַ֝פְשָׁ֗ם <S%H5315><s%> their soul בְּרָעָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> because of trouble תִתְמוֹגָֽג׃ <S%H4127><s%> is melted

יָח֣וֹגּוּ <S%H2287><s%> They reel to and fro וְ֭יָנוּעוּ <S%H5128><s%> and stagger כַּשִּׁכּ֑וֹר <S%H7910><s%> like a drunken man וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and were at חָ֝כְמָתָ֗ם <S%H2451><s%> and are at their wits' תִּתְבַּלָּֽע׃ <S%H1104><s%> end

וַיִּצְעֲק֣וּ <S%H6817><s%> Then they cry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יְ֭הוָה <S%H3069><s%> God בַּצַּ֣ר <S%H6862><s%> in their trouble לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> out וּֽ֝מִמְּצֽוּקֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H4691><s%> of their distresses יוֹצִיאֵֽם׃ <S%H3318><s%> and he bringeth them out
יָקֵ֣ם <S%H6965><s%> He maketh סְ֭עָרָה <S%H5591><s%> the storm לִדְמָמָ֑ה <S%H1827><s%> a calm וַ֝יֶּחֱשׁ֗וּ <S%H2814><s%> thereof are still גַּלֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1530><s%> so that the waves

וַיִּשְׂמְח֥וּ <S%H8055><s%> Then are they glad כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because יִשְׁתֹּ֑קוּ <S%H8367><s%> because they be quiet וַ֝יַּנְחֵ֗ם <S%H5148><s%> so he bringeth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מְח֥וֹז <S%H4231><s%> haven חֶפְצָֽם׃ <S%H2656><s%> them unto their desired

יוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> Oh that [men] would praise לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD חַסְדּ֑וֹ <S%H2617><s%> [for] his goodness וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <S%H6381><s%> and [for] his wonderful works לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> to the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

וִֽ֭ירֹמְמוּהוּ <S%H7311><s%> Let them exalt בִּקְהַל־ <S%H6951><s%> him also in the congregation עָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וּבְמוֹשַׁ֖ב <S%H4186><s%> him in the assembly זְקֵנִ֣ים <S%H2205><s%> of the elders יְהַלְלֽוּהוּ׃ <S%H1984><s%> and praise

יָשֵׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> He turneth נְהָר֣וֹת <S%H5104><s%> rivers לְמִדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> into a wilderness וּמֹצָ֥אֵי <S%H4161><s%> and springs מַ֝֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water לְצִמָּאֽוֹן׃ <S%H6774><s%> into dry ground
אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land פְּ֭רִי <S%H6529><s%> A fruitful לִמְלֵחָ֑ה <S%H4420><s%> into barrenness מֵ֝רָעַ֗ת <S%H7451><s%> for the wickedness יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> of them that dwell בָֽהּ׃

יָשֵׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> He turneth מִ֭דְבָּר <S%H4057><s%> the wilderness לַֽאֲגַם־ <S%H98><s%> into a standing מַ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> water וְאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ground צִ֝יָּ֗ה <S%H6723><s%> and dry לְמֹצָ֥אֵי <S%H4161><s%> springs מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> of water

וַיּ֣וֹשֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> to dwell שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> and there רְעֵבִ֑ים <S%H7457><s%> And there he maketh the hungry וַ֝יְכוֹנְנ֗וּ <S%H3559><s%> that they may prepare עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> a city מוֹשָֽׁב׃ <S%H4186><s%> for habitation

וַיִּזְרְע֣וּ <S%H2232><s%> And sow שָׂ֭דוֹת <S%H7704><s%> the fields וַיִּטְּע֣וּ <S%H5193><s%> and plant כְרָמִ֑ים <S%H3754><s%> vineyards וַ֝יַּעֲשׂ֗וּ <S%H6213><s%> which may yield פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> fruits תְבֽוּאָה׃ <S%H8393><s%> of increase

וַיְבָרֲכֵ֣ם <S%H1288><s%> He blesseth וַיִּרְבּ֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> them also so that they are multiplied מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> greatly וּ֝בְהֶמְתָּ֗ם <S%H929><s%> not their cattle לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יַמְעִֽיט׃ <S%H4591><s%> to decrease

וַיִּמְעֲט֥וּ <S%H4591><s%> Again they are minished וַיָּשֹׁ֑חוּ <S%H7817><s%> and brought low מֵעֹ֖צֶר <S%H6115><s%> through oppression רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> affliction וְיָגֽוֹן׃ <S%H3015><s%> and sorrow ׆

שֹׁפֵ֣ךְ <S%H8210><s%> He poureth בּ֭וּז <S%H937><s%> contempt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon נְדִיבִ֑ים <S%H5081><s%> upon princes וַ֝יַּתְעֵ֗ם <S%H8582><s%> and causeth them to wander בְּתֹ֣הוּ <S%H8414><s%> in the wilderness לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no דָֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> [where there is] no way

וַיְשַׂגֵּ֣ב <S%H7682><s%> on high אֶבְי֣וֹן <S%H34><s%> Yet setteth he the poor מֵע֑וֹנִי <S%H6040><s%> from affliction וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and maketh כַּ֝צֹּ֗אן <S%H6629><s%> like a flock מִשְׁפָּחֽוֹת׃ <S%H4940><s%> [him] families

יִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> shall see יְשָׁרִ֣ים <S%H3477><s%> The righteous וְיִשְׂמָ֑חוּ <S%H8055><s%> [it] and rejoice וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַ֝וְלָ֗ה <S%H5766><s%> and all iniquity קָ֣פְצָה <S%H7092><s%> shall stop פִּֽיהָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> her mouth

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who חָכָ֥ם <S%H2450><s%> Whoso [is] wise וְיִשְׁמָר־ <S%H8104><s%> and will observe אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> to these וְ֝יִתְבּֽוֹנְנ֗וּ <S%H995><s%> these [things] even they shall understand חַֽסְדֵ֥י <S%H2617><s%> the lovingkindness יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD
